actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to investigate and study the feasibility of a Federal Insurance program covering livestock and other similar agricultural entities not covered under the Federal Crop Insurance Act, and to report to the Congress the results of such investigation and study.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to investigate and study the feasibility of a Federal insurance program covering livestock and other agricultural entities not covered under the Federal Crop Insurance Act, and to report to the Congress the results of such investigation and study.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to investigate and study the feasibility of a Federal Insurance program covering livestock and other similar agricultural entities not covered under the Federal Crop Insurance Act, and to report to the Congress the results of such investigation and study.
